name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Frontend Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in crafting high-performance, user-centric applications utilizing **TypeScript**, **Vue.js**, **Nuxt.js**, and **React Native**. My technical repertoire includes a strong focus on Mobile-First design, performance optimization, and adherence to modern web standards, ensuring exceptional usability and platform optimization.
I have a demonstrated ability to integrate best practices in frontend development, enhancing browser optimization while fostering a collaborative team environment. My curiosity drives me to constantly explore innovative solutions that improve user experiences. Additionally, my background in full-stack development, with skills in **Python**, **Flutter**, and utilizing frameworks like **React**, along with cloud experience on **Azure** and **AWS**, empowers me to deliver robust applications aligned with industry standards.
